Text.Page:
I understand you soldiers have more important things to do, but the situation has gotten so bad! You must help me.

The gulas inflict wounds that fester almost instantly. I need to make an ointment bandage to stop the wounds from becoming infected. I need {@RawItem:206819} to do it.

You won't find any {@RawItem:206819} in this area. You'll have to buy some from other people, or try to find it in some other area.
I know plant-gathering isn't exactly what the recruiter promised you, but you're saving your comrades' lives, <PCNAME>. Thanks!
I need more <font color='#660000'>{@RawItem:206819}</font>. It's that simple.
